sourcesContent:
// Enhanced destinations data with detailed accommodation information
export const destinations = [{
        id: 1,
        name: "Cox's Bazar",
        district: "Cox's Bazar District",
        description: "The longest natural sea beach in the world, stretching over 120km with pristine golden sands and stunning sunsets.",
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507525428034-b723cf961d3e?crop=entropy&cs=srgb&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NDQ2MzR8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwzfHxiZWFjaCUyMHN1bnNldHxlbnwwfHx8fDE3NjQ2NzY2OTZ8MA&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=85",
        category: "Beach & Coast",
        rating: 4.8,
        duration: "2-3 days",
        tips: [
            "Visit during October to March for pleasant weather",
            "Try fresh seafood at local restaurants",
            "Watch the spectacular sunrise and sunset",
            "Visit Himchari National Park nearby"
        ],
        accommodations: [{
                type: "Beach Resort",
                name: "Sea Pearl Beach Resort & Spa",
                description: "Luxurious beachfront resort offering world-class amenities with direct beach access. Features modern rooms with ocean views, multiple dining options, and a full-service spa.",
                features: [
                    "Private beach access",
                    "Infinity pool overlooking the ocean",
                    "Full-service spa and wellness center",
                    "Multiple restaurants (Asian, Continental, Seafood)",
                    "Kids club and family activities",
                    "Water sports facilities",
                    "Free WiFi throughout property",
                    "24-hour room service"
                ],
                priceRange: "$120-$250/night",
                rating: 4.7,
                contact: {
                    phone: "+880 341-64300",
                    email: "reservation@seapearlbd.com",
                    website: "www.seapearlbd.com",
                    address: "Hotel Motel Zone, Kolatoli Road, Cox's Bazar"
                },
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571896349842-33c89424de2d?w=800&q=80"
            },
            {
                type: "Hotel",
                name: "Ocean Paradise Hotel & Resort",
                description: "Mid-range hotel perfect for families and couples, offering comfortable accommodations with sea-facing balconies and easy access to the beach.",
                features: [
                    "Sea-facing rooms with balconies",
                    "Rooftop restaurant with panoramic views",
                    "Swimming pool",
                    "Complimentary breakfast",
                    "Tour and travel desk",
                    "Free parking",
                    "Airport shuttle service",
                    "Conference facilities"
                ],
                priceRange: "$60-$120/night",
                rating: 4.4,
                contact: {
                    phone: "+880 341-51917",
                    email: "info@oceanparadisebd.com",
                    website: "www.oceanparadisebd.com",
                    address: "Marine Drive Road, Kolatoli, Cox's Bazar"
                },
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=800&q=80"
            },
            {
                type: "Guest House",
                name: "Coral View Guest House",
                description: "Budget-friendly accommodation with home-like comfort. Perfect for backpackers and solo travelers looking for clean, simple rooms near the beach.",
                features: [
                    "Clean and comfortable rooms",
                    "Shared kitchen facilities",
                    "Common lounge area",
                    "Bicycle rental",
                    "Local tour guidance",
                    "Laundry service",
                    "Free WiFi",
                    "24-hour security"
                ],
                priceRange: "$15-$35/night",
                rating: 4.2,
                contact: {
                    phone: "+880 1812-345678",
                    email: "coralviewgh@gmail.com",
                    website: "facebook.com/coralviewguesthouse",
                    address: "Laboni Point, Cox's Bazar"
                },
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267?w=800&q=80"
            },
            {
                type: "Beach Cottage",
                name: "Sandy Shores Beach Cottages",
                description: "Charming traditional cottages right on the beach, offering a unique and intimate experience with nature. Perfect for romantic getaways.",
                features: [
                    "Private beach cottages",
                    "Direct beach access",
                    "Outdoor seating areas",
                    "BBQ facilities",
                    "Traditional Bengali cuisine",
                    "Bonfire arrangements",
                    "Hammocks and beach chairs",
                    "Pet-friendly options"
                ],
                priceRange: "$40-$80/night",
                rating: 4.5,
                contact: {
                    phone: "+880 1923-456789",
                    email: "sandyshores@email.com",
                    website: "www.sandyshoresbd.com",
                    address: "Sugandha Beach Point, Cox's Bazar"
                },
                image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520250497591-112f2f40a3f4?w=800&q=80"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        name: "Bandarban",
        district: "Chittagong Hill Districts",
        description: "A paradise for nature lovers with majestic mountains, waterfalls, and indigenous tribal culture in the heart of the hill tracts.",
